Params: {1: 'Dear 【kuroname】,', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "You don't know how elated I was to receive a reply from you.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's been no more than two days since I first sent the letter. Babylonia really is small, isn't it?", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'But just the wait itself made me realize why people in the olden days used to be so fond of communicating through letters.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The act of waiting heightens emotions, akin to watching fruit ripen. It fills one with anxiety and expectations.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Perhaps it's not highly efficient, but it's worth the wait.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I\'d like to once again formally introduce myself. My pen name is "Iris".', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>And I'm emphasizing my name for the second time because I'd like to share with you the meaning behind this name, <para\\>something I didn't do in my first letter.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '<para\\>I chanced upon this beautiful name while reading The Tempest. You may have heard of this opera, but in any case,<para\\>please let me provide you with an excerpt.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Then there was a series of beautiful transcriptions. The person who wrote this letter even changed the color of ink to write this poetic text.'}
{1: 'Ceres, the goddess of fertility, I am the rainbow in the sky, and I am the envoy of the Queen of Heaven;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The Queen of Heaven, in the clouds, sent a message to ask you to leave your supple field where wheat, barley, rye, oats, wild beans and peas flourish;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Thy turfy mountains, where live nibbling sheep, and flat meads thatch'd with stover, them to keep;", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Thy banks with pioned and twilled brims, which spongy April at thy hest betrims;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To make cold nymphs chaste crowns; and thy broom-groves;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Whose shadow the dismissed bachelor loves;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Being lass-lorn: thy pole-clipt vineyard; And thy sea-marge, sterile and rocky-hard, where thou thyself dost air;', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>—the queen o' the sky, whose watery arch and messenger am I;<para\\>Bids thee leave these, and with her sovereign grace, here on this grass-plot, in this very place;", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To come and sport: her peacocks fly amain: Approach, rich Ceres, her to entertain.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'Writing here now, even the pen tip and pressure have become more "soft".'}
{1: 'These are lines from The Tempest. Iris is the goddess of the rainbow and the emissary of the gods.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "The rainbow bridges Heaven and Earth. It conveys people's joys and sorrows to the gods and spreads their gospel to the world.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm fascinated both by the things that Iris symbolizes, as well as by the stanza itself.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I've never seen the things it mentions, so I keep fantasizing about them and imagining what they're like.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'If their names are already so perfect, imagine how beautiful they would be in real life.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, with a turn of the pen—'}
{1: "My apologies, I'm rambling on and on about my interests again.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "This has always been a bad habit of mine, or at least, that's what my parents often say.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I just want to share what I lost most with you.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I love operas. I love the stuff that exists only in stories and in imagination.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And what about you? What is it that you love?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: 'Iris:', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Hello.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I heard this name before.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It also symbolizes something else', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '—the flower iris.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Have you ever seen one?', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'As for what I love...', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'You have been writing with a pen pal named Iris for some time.'}
{3: 'Relying on the fragmentary information between the lines, you slowly piecs together the overall image of her.'}
{3: 'She likes art, music, literature, opera, instrumental performance, and singing.'}
{3: 'In a time like this, when the Punishing Virus has taken away everything, the act of loving these things is an extravagance in and of itself.'}

{3: 'She is an innocent little girl who has never experienced any setbacks in life. She does not have to worry about anything other than herself. Only a greenhouse free of any contaminants would be able to produce such innocence.'}
{3: 'A flower of Eden that knows nothing of the real world.'}
{3: 'She lives in a perfect world, so even if you do not see things her way, you would not want to destroy the perfection she lives in.'}
{3: 'And you cannot avoid slowly opening up about your life as you send letters back and forth.'}
{3: "You have started asking and answering each other's questions in those letters."}
{1: 'In your last letter, you mentioned the words like F.O.S. Later, I went back to learn more about it.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'With all due respect, 【kuroname】, were you a student at F.O.S. Military Command College? Are you a soldier?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Your writing is very special, sharp, beautiful and full of power, that's why I have this speculation.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'As your writing suggests, you certainly have a strong will.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I hope to become just like you, so resolute and determined.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Let's talk about me then. I don't have my life planned out.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "But it's said that on turning 18, every resident of Eden will be allocated a suitable job by Gestalt.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've been thinking about what kind of person I want to become.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "If I do nothing and go along with Gestalt's affinity and suitability matching data, letting it determine my future, my life would probably be very dull.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'As mentioned previously, I love operas.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Using the libretto and music to convey your inner world to others... I feel that it's an especially meaningful endeavor.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'What do you think?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
